name: Arminius (PhilippSeidel, Janispe, schweikart, chasmjaga)
description:
Cute game about the horrible slaughter in the teutoburg forest. There were no roman survivors. seriously.

Assets used

UI Font: https://typodermicfonts.com/
Title Font: https://www.dafont.com/de/runelike.font
UI Graphics: https://www.freepik.com/free-vector/wooden-gold-buttons-ui-game_12760665.htm
Ground Textures & Grass: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/nature/grass-flowers-pack-free-138810

Source code

Available on GitHub: https://github.com/schweikart/historically-accurate-game-jam-5
